2.0.0.en: Replacement for SmartThings Hub so the app id doesn't conflict with the Athom SmartThings app

2.0.3.en: Added extra condition to motionSensor. Added objectDetection and imageCapture to get more information.

2.0.4.en: Updated image capture to show image. Added Object type. Fixed Object detection.

2.0.5.en: More logging of device discovery. Only request hidden compoants of the capability exists.

2.0.6.en: Added extra Flow trigers for fridge / freezer.

2.0.7.en: Fix 'error Missing Capability Listener: aircon_fan_mode'. Added button status to tag to determine if Pushed or Held.

2.0.8.en: Fix 'HTTP error' when setting the AC Fan Mode.

2.0.9.en: Added Sleep and Windfree and removed Turbo to / from AC Fan Mode.

2.0.10.en: Fix Action capability for aircon_fan_mode. New icon for air purifier when just aircon_fan_mode detected.

2.0.11.en: Fix date and time not using Homey time zone.

2.0.13.en: Added support for PM10, PM2.5, PM1 and Odor sensors.

2.0.14.en: Added Odor Status and fixed missing PM1 value.

2.0.15.en: Added Odor Status and fixed missing PM1 value (take 2).

2.0.16.en: Check if temperature is in Fahrenheit and convert to Celsius.

2.0.17.en: Check if temperature is in Fahrenheit and convert to Celsius for refrigeration device.

2.0.18.en: Added Job Status Changed Flow trigger.

2.0.21.en: Fix issue where value was a string when a number was required. Fixed image path on Homey 2023.

2.0.22.en: Added 'DisplayPort' to media input source list. Remove bad capabilities from the device to prevent repetitive errors.
